mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training_job_record (id, resource_pool_id, k8s_job_name, job_name, status, created_by, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{resourcePoolId}, #{k8sJobName}, #{jobName}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE training_job_record SET status = #{status}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM training_job_record WHERE resource_pool_id = #{resourcePoolId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
